hero.hero-second: Systems and Computer Engineering student in training.
hero.hero-third: Systems Engineering student in the top tenth, with a solid foundation in technology and analytical skills.

about.about-sub: Get to know me a little more.
about.about2-text: I am currently in my eighth semester of Systems and Computer Engineering, which has allowed me to acquire skills in systems analysis, web and desktop programming, as well as process optimization using operations research techniques.

projects.projects-subtitle: Here are some projects I have worked on.
projects.project1-desc: Designed to promote responsible pet adoption, facilitate donations, and provide information about animal care in Piura.
projects.project2-desc: Platform to customize and preserve your favorite memories through products like polaroid-style photos, frames, and keychains.
projects.project3-desc: System to organize and manage collections of books and magazines, ideal for libraries or individual users.
projects.project4-desc: Platform developed to inform users about the institution, featuring an admin mode for efficient management.
projects.project5-desc: Mockup project designed to showcase skills in modern and functional interface design.
projects.project6-desc: Portal created to centralize and share relevant information from the faculty, connecting students and teachers.

skills.skills-subtitle: What I have learned so far.
